meanings.definition: A toxic alkaloid found in plants of the genus Colchicum, used in the treatment of gout.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed colchicines to help with my gout pain.
meanings.sent2: Colchicines are often used to alleviate the symptoms of gout.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook colchicines for a herb and tried to use it in my salad!
meanings.sent4: The effect of colchicines on gout is like a powerful warrior fighting the pain.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant purple flowers of Colchicum contain the potent colchicines.

meanings.definition: A medication derived from colchicine, used to treat gout and familial Mediterranean fever.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather takes colchicines regularly to manage his gout.
meanings.sent2: Colchicines have been effective in treating familial Mediterranean fever.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled the bottle of colchicines, and now my cat thinks they are treats!
meanings.sent4: The relief brought by colchicines is like a soothing balm for those suffering from gout.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacist explained the benefits of colchicines in managing gout symptoms.
